main.name: Chris Thompson
main.description: I eat, sleep and breathe React
main.bio: Hey there, I'm Chris Thompson. I've been coding for a little over a year now. As a Frontend developer I've worked as an intern with a SaaS startup, currently working with an NFT startup company building their front-end, and built out my own series of robust react apps. Along the journey I realised my passion for making an impact on the world through the engaging skill of software development. I decided to commit myself 100% to this craft after having such an empowering experience starting from ground zero and getting to the point where I could build out my own projects
main.contactmessage: Get in touch to work with me!

education.description: Learned the MERN Stack through individualized mentorship

work.title: Software Engineering Intern
work.description: Assisting in key software updates on both the UI frontend side as well as the backend.

work.title: Front-End Software Engineering
work.description: Building the front-end design for cryptofunk NFT main website.
